page.title: 01ALLENDALE
page.content: { Allendale}is a small town{11}miles from{Hexham}and{33}miles from{ {Newcastle.}It is in the South-West corner of{Northumberland.}It is surrounded by countryside, fields, forests, farms. It is a very good place for tourists, as it has many hotels. In fact it has more hotel beds than Hexham which is a much larger town. Allendale used to be a very important lead mining district, but all the mines are closed down now. There is a small Recreation Ground in the village which has a bowling green, a tennis court, and a small childrens play area. Other things include the cricket ground, the golf course and the fire station.
